longdescription.p: Gentoo/NetBSD (or Gentoo/NBSD, or G/NBSD) is an effort to create a complete NetBSD-based Gentoo system, sharing the complete administration facilities of Gentoo with the reliability of the NetBSD kernel and userland.
There is Gentoo/NetBSD stage3 done so installation is possible without NetBSD installation. To install Gentoo/NetBSD follow the install guide.
This project is still in its infancy. If you are interested in working on it, please send an email to the Gentoo/*BSD team.
To be a complete Gentoo system, Gentoo/NetBSD must be installed with stages that carries the minimum software neede to run the system.
